sections.description: Maintain small utils for WooCommerce orders.
sections.installation: Click the activate button and that's it.
sections.changelog:
v1.0.1 released on October 16, 2025

  • Bugfix: Resolved issue with order number duplication.
  • Improvement: Optimized database queries for better performance.
  • Feature: Added support for custom prefixes and suffixes in order numbers.

v1.1.4 released on January 30, 2025

  • Bugfix: Corrected issue with order number display in admin panel.
  • Improvement: Enhanced performance for large order volumes.

v1.1.3 released on November 16, 2025

  • Bugfix: Fixed issue with order number sequence.
  • Improvement: Updated compatibility with latest WooCommerce version.

v1.1.2 released on October 19, 2025

  • Bugfix: Resolved issue with order number formatting.
  • Improvement: Enhanced compatibility with WooCommerce 6.6.2.

v1.1.1 released on October 18, 2025

  • Feature: Show plugin details on plugins page.

v1.1 released on October 17, 2025

  • Feature: Automatic updates integrated with Github release.
  • Improvement: Add settings link to plugin page.

v1.0.1 released on October 16, 2025

  • Initial release of WooCommerc Custom number. Ability to customize and use custom order numbers for WooCommerce.
  • Feature: Customizable order number format.
  • Feature: Utilites for custom number regeneration and reset.
